SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.objectives

Class Objective

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.objectives.Objective
public class Objective extends Object
Represents an objective in the game. Objectives define criteria for scoring points for players.

    • Objective

      public Objective(Function<Player,Integer> pointCalculator, int id, String type, com.google.gson.JsonElement requirements, int points)
      Constructs a new Objective with the specified point calculator function.
      Parameters:
      pointCalculator - The function to calculate points for the objective based on the player.
      id - The unique identifier of the objective.
      type - The type of the objective.
      requirements - The requirements for the objective in JSON format.
